channel.title: Pygments on zzamboni.org
channel.description: Recent content in Pygments on zzamboni.org

item.title: Cfengine3 lexer for Pygments
item.description: I have written a Cfengine3 lexer for Pygments, the open source syntax-highlighter used by Gist and many other sites. It seems to work fine on all the cfengine policy files I have tested, but if you find anything that doesn't quite work as expected, please let me know. This is my first-ever Pygments lexer, so if you are an expert and can advise me on better ways of doing things, I'd very much appreciate the feedback too.
